metaTags.metaDescription: The Cloudflare Pro Plan is for websites, blogs, and startups requiring basic security and performance. Learn more about Pro Plan features and pricing.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Deliver a lightning fast web experience
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare optimizes the performance of your websites and applications, delivering fast content through its global network. Cloudflare Pro is best suited for professional websites, high traffic blogs, and startups requiring increased security and performance.

Bundle the Pro plan with Argo Smart Routing and/or Load Balancing to maximize your web application speed, performance, and availability.

relatedBlades.title: Website optimization tools included in the Pro Plan

features.title: Lossless and Lossy Image Optimization
features.description: Reduces image sizes by stripping metadata and applying lossless or lossy compression to remove redundant bytes from images using Polish.

features.title: Accelerated Image Delivery for Mobile
features.description: Use Mirage to accelerate image delivery based on your visitor's device. Mirage automatically detects screen size and connection speed to optimally deliver images.

features.title: Prioritized Loading of Key Site Assets
features.description: Enable your server rather than visitors' browsers to make prioritization decisions about which site resources are loaded first using Enhanced HTTP/2 Prioritization.

features.title: Analyze and Improve CDN Caching
features.description: See what site assets cannot be served by the Cloudflare CDN because they are missing, expired, or ineligible for caching. Use this data to make changes to increase the number of cached resources and improve site speed.

features.title: WordPress Plugin
features.description: Optimize your WordPress site by using the Automatic Platform Optimization (APO) plugin for CDN, intelligent caching, and more. Turn it on and go (up to 300% faster).

features.title: Content Prefetch for Google Search
features.description: Improve Core Web Vitals, such as the Largest Contentful Paint (LCP), that are key factors in organic search rankings (SEO). Automatic Signed Exchange enables Chromium based browsers to prefetch your website on Google's search results page and make your website faster.

content.value: Why bundle your Cloudflare Pro plan with our speed tool add-ons?
Here's the TLDR. If you only read one thing, read this.
A robust global network at your fingertips
Uncompromised security and performance in one platform
Reduce latency, improve performance, and increase availability for all your applications
Real-time latency maps
Detailed traffic analytics
Predictable, transparent, and flexible pricing

relatedBlades.copy:
Argo Smart Routing improves your web performance by 30%

- Argo Smart Routing detects real-time congestion and routes web traffic across the fastest and most reliable network paths. - Instantly improve site speed, reliability, and reduce cloud egress costs with minimal changes to your configuration.

Reduce server strain and latency with Load Balancing

- Load Balancing distributes traffic evenly across your healthy servers, automatically failing over when a server is unhealthy or unresponsive. - Cloudflare makes it easy to set up load balancing and monitor your servers at configurable intervals and across multiple data centers to look for specific status codes, response text, and timeouts.
Maximize performance by bundling website optimization tools together with your Pro plan

features.title: Speed up your global traffic
features.description: Add Argo Smart Routing to avoid Internet "traffic jams" and serve your site via the fastest connections available, resulting in noticeably faster load times.

features.title: Reduce latency at scale
features.description: Add Load Balancing to route your visitors away from unhealthy origin servers and failover instantly with zero downtime.

features.title: Improve end user experience
features.description: Bundle both Argo Smart Routing and Load Balancing with the Pro plan and maximize your website's speed and availability.

plansList.description: For users primarily focused on improving website and application performance.
Enhance your Pro Plan with Argo to experience faster website load times and reduced latency, all while simplifying management through a single platform.

plansList.billingSubtext: + Load Balancing Usage ($0.50 per additional 500,000 requests)
plansList.description: Ensure a reliable, fast, and secure web presence with zero downtime, especially for websites and applications that need to handle varying levels of traffic and prioritize user experience.

plansList.billingSubtext: + Argo Usage ($0.10 per gigabyte) + Load Balancing Usage ($0.50 per additional 500,000 requests)
plansList.description: For websites or applications that require top-notch performance and reliability while minimizing security risks and management complexity.

relatedBlades.quote: "Just as Canva simplifies graphic design, Cloudflare simplifies performance and security. Thanks to Cloudflare, we can focus on growing our product and expanding into new markets with confidence, knowing that our platform is fast, reliable, and secure."

relatedBlades.copy:
Getting started is easy

Get started with Cloudflare in four easy steps. It only takes 5 minutes.

features.title: Create an account
features.description: You only need an email and a password. That's all!

features.title: Pick a domain
features.description: Select the domain name you want to use with the Pro plan + speed bundle.

features.title: Update your nameservers
features.description: Make a quick change to your DNS settings in your registrar's dashboard.

features.title: Get going
features.description: Activate the Cloudflare features to take advantage of all the speed benefits.

relatedBlades.bladeName: PAYGO - Bundle - Pro Plan - Argo Smart Routing - Load Balancing - FAQs
relatedBlades.title: Frequently asked questions

accordionElements.title: When is the right time to upgrade from the Free plan to Pro plan?

content.value: Over 50% of Cloudflare's Pro plan customers started on the Free plan and eventually upgraded so they can activate more security and performance features. Ultimately the decision to upgrade is yours, but if any of the conditions below are true, you will likely find the Pro plan beneficial:Â
Your website is generating revenue on a monthly basis;
You have more than 1TB of web traffic;
You fully manage your web server and are responsible for upgrading, patching and maintenance;
Your website uses server-side applications (PHP, Python, Ruby, C#, JavaScript, etc.)
There is a substantial risk if your website is hacked.

accordionElements.title: Cloudflare offers free CDN and DNS. Why should I pay for a Pro plan?

content.value: With Cloudflare Pro you have access to the same great DNS, CDN and DDoS protection tools as our Free plans give you, but you enjoy increased control over how you can use these tools.
For example, with Cloudflare Pro, you have more Cache Rules available to dictate how CDN caches your content, including what gets cached and for how long at the individual page level

accordionElements.title: Can I keep my current DNS provider and still use the other features of the Pro plan?

content.value: This feature requires a Business or Enterprise Plan. The Business and Enterprise plans allow you to still leverage our network with a partial (CNAME) setup while maintaining your current DNS provider.

accordionElements.title: How does Argo Smart Routing work?

content.value: Argo Smart Routing detects real-time network issues and routes traffic across the most efficient network path. These benefits are most apparent for users farthest from your origin server.
Learn more about Argo Smart Routing

accordionElements.title: What is the meaning of load balancing?

content.value: Load balancing is the practice of distributing computational workloads between two or more computers. On the Internet, load balancing is often employed to divide network traffic among several servers. This reduces the strain on each server and makes the servers more efficient, speeding up performance and reducing latency.
Learn more about Load Balancing

accordionElements.title: What security features and tools are included in the Pro plan?

content.value: The Cloudflare Pro plan offers multiple tools to protect your website or application from cyber attacks. These include:
Challenging or blocking definitely automated traffic and verified bots using Super Bot Fight Mode.
Stopping common cyber threats like SQL injection by deploying the OWASP Core Managed Ruleset
Protecting against new attacks identified by Cloudflare's always learning WAF by deploying the Cloudflare Managed Ruleset

Performing automated credentials checks against a public database of stolen credentials to prevent fraud and misuse of your applications. Deploy using Cloudflare's Exposed Credentials Check Managed Ruleset for WAF.
Customizing WAF and bot protection using 20 WAF Custom Rules
View more features

relatedBlades.title: Supercharge Your Website Today with Cloudflare Pro Plan
